activities: We collect information according to the product or service involved, including business contact information, financial information and information related to support. Information may be used for a variety of purposes, including customer service, billing, software download and software and service support. In connection with our provision of services, some customers may request us to maintain, host, or provide us with access to their information.  In connection with such services, the customer has control of such information and any access to or use of such information by us is incidental to completing our contractual requirements for the customer.  We also transfer information from our subsidiary in the United Kingdom to our offices in the United States for internal management of personnel including administration of payroll, services and benefits.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
recoursemech:
BBB EU Safe Harbor program;
EU Data Protection Authorities Panel (DPAs) and Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner (FDPIC) for human resources data only
